original_title: One person shot dead in Panadura
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); One person was shot dead in Pinwatte, Panadura on Tuesday (28) morning.
Sri Lanka Police said that the shooting took place close to the Pinwatte Public Cemetery.
